item.title: Ncuti Gatwa on Leaving ‘Doctor Who’: ‘It Takes a Lot Out of You — Physically, Emotionally, Mentally’
item.description: Ncuti Gatwa is opening up about why he left “Doctor Who” after only two seasons. In a new interview on the BBC’s “Sunday With Laura Kuenssberg,” the “Barbie”
